RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DCD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_VERS, OBJ_DESCN, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, TBL_MAP_ID, MAP_DF_TYPE, MAP_DF_ID, MAP_SNO, TBL_MAP_TYPE, TGT_SUBJ_ID, TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, TGT_DB_ID, TGT_DB_PNM, TGT_TBL_ID, TGT_TBL_LNM, TGT_TBL_PNM, TGT_FLF_TYPE, SRC_BIZ_ID, SRC_BIZ_NM, SRC_SYS_ID, SRC_SYS_NM, SRC_DB_ID, SRC_DB_PNM, SRC_TBL_ID, SRC_TBL_LNM, SRC_TBL_PNM, SLT_SKP_CND_NM, JN_CND_NM, APP_CRGP_ID, APP_CRGP_NM, CNVS_CRGP_ID, CNVS_CRGP_NM, REF_DESCN, PRE_FLF_DESCN, TGT_CHRG

, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_VERS, OBJ_DESCN, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, MAP_DF_ID, MAP_DF_TYPE, MAP_SNO, TBL_MAP_TYPE, TGT_SUBJ_ID, TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, TGT_DB_ID, TGT_DB_PNM, TGT_TBL_ID, TGT_TBL_LNM, TGT_TBL_PNM, TGT_FLF_TYPE, SRC_BIZ_ID, SRC_BIZ_NM, SRC_SYS_ID, SRC_SYS_NM, SRC_DB_ID, SRC_DB_PNM, SRC_TBL_ID, SRC_TBL_LNM, SRC_TBL_PNM, SLT_SKP_CND_NM, JN_CND_NM, APP_CRGP_ID, APP_CRGP_NM, CNVS_CRGP_ID, CNVS_CRGP_NM, REF_DESCN, PRE_FLF_DESCN, TGT_CHRG

APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, MAP_DF_TYPE, MAP_DF_ID, MAP_SNO, TBL_MAP_TYPE, TGT_SUBJ_ID, TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, TGT_DB_ID, TGT_DB_PNM, TGT_TBL_ID, TGT_TBL_LNM, TGT_TBL_PNM, TGT_FLF_TYPE, SRC_BIZ_ID, SRC_BIZ_NM, SRC_SYS_ID, SRC_SYS_NM, SRC_DB_ID, SRC_DB_PNM, SRC_TBL_ID, SRC_TBL_LNM, SRC_TBL_PNM, SLT_SKP_CND_NM, JN_CND_NM, APP_CRGP_ID, APP_CRGP_NM, CNVS_CRGP_ID, CNVS_CRGP_NM, REF_DESCN, PRE_FLF_DESCN, TGT_CHRG ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapDfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tblMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtSubjAllPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnvsCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnvsCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preFlfDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtChrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_TBL_MAP WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

update WAQ_TBL_MAP
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAP_DF_TYPE = #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAP_DF_ID = #{mapDfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAP_SNO = #{mapSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TBL_MAP_TYPE = #{tblMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_SUBJ_ID = #{tgtSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH = #{tgtSubjAllPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DB_ID = #{tgtDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DB_PNM = #{tgtDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_TBL_ID = #{tgtTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_TBL_LNM = #{tgtTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_TBL_PNM = #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_FLF_TYPE = #{tgtFlfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_BIZ_ID = #{srcBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_BIZ_NM = #{srcBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_SYS_ID = #{srcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_SYS_NM = #{srcSysNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DB_ID = #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DB_PNM = #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_ID = #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_LNM = #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_PNM = #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SLT_SKP_CND_NM = #{sltSkpCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JN_CND_NM = #{jnCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_CRGP_ID = #{appCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_CRGP_NM = #{appCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CNVS_CRGP_ID = #{cnvsCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CNVS_CRGP_NM = #{cnvsCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REF_DESCN = #{refDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRE_FLF_DESCN = #{preFlfDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_CHRG = #{tgtChrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_TBL_MAP set RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_DF_TYPE = #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_DF_ID = #{mapDfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_SNO = #{mapSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TBL_MAP_TYPE = #{tblMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_SUBJ_ID = #{tgtSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH = #{tgtSubjAllPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DB_ID = #{tgtDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DB_PNM = #{tgtDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_TBL_ID = #{tgtTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_TBL_LNM = #{tgtTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_TBL_PNM = #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_FLF_TYPE = #{tgtFlfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_BIZ_ID = #{srcBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_BIZ_NM = #{srcBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_SYS_ID = #{srcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_SYS_NM = #{srcSysNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DB_ID = #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DB_PNM = #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_ID = #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_LNM = #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_PNM = #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SLT_SKP_CND_NM = #{sltSkpCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JN_CND_NM = #{jnCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CRGP_ID = #{appCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CRGP_NM = #{appCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CNVS_CRGP_ID = #{cnvsCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CNVS_CRGP_NM = #{cnvsCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REF_DESCN = #{refDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRE_FLF_DESCN = #{preFlfDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_CHRG = #{tgtChrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

--등록유형코드(C/U/D), 검증코드 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_TBL_MAP A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.TBL_MAP_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WAM_TBL_MAP B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.MAP_DF_ID = B.MAP_DF_ID AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X')
) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
--검증쿼리 : 요청서내 중복 테이블매핑정의서(TM001) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_TBL_MAP D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.MAP_DF_ID = D.MAP_DF_ID
AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)

--검증쿼리 : 삭제대상 테이블매핑정의서 미존재(TM002) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP D WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = D.MAP_DF_ID
AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

--검증쿼리 : 삭제대상 컬럼매핑정의서미존재(TM007) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP D WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = D.MAP_DF_ID
AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

--검증쿼리 : 요청중인 테이블매핑정의서 (TM003) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_TBL_MAP D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.MAP_DF_ID = D.MAP_DF_ID
AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )
--검증쿼리 : 타겟테이블 미존재(TM004) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D WHERE A.TGT_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 소스테이블 미존재(TM006) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ASIS_PDM_TBL D WHERE A.SRC_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP M WHERE A.SRC_TBL_PNM = M.TGT_TBL_PNM UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_TBL_MAP Q WHERE A.SRC_TBL_PNM = Q.TGT_TBL_PNM AND A.RQST_NO = Q.RQST_NO ) AND TBL_MAP_TYPE IN ('M','R')
--검증쿼리 : 응용담당자외 등록,수정,삭제 불가(TM005) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP B WHERE NVL(A.APP_CRGP_NM, 'X') != NVL(B.APP_CRGP_NM, 'O') AND NVL(A.MAP_DF_ID, 'X') = NVL(B.MAP_DF_ID, 'O') )

--검증쿼리 : 변경일 때 변경된 데이터가 없을 경우 (TM000) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP D WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = D.MAP_DF_ID AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(A.MAP_SNO, '_') = NVL(D.MAP_SNO, '_') AND NVL(A.TBL_MAP_TYPE, '_') = NVL(D.TBL_MAP_TYPE, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_SUBJ_ID, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_TBL_LNM, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_TBL_LNM, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_FLF_TYPE, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_FLF_TYPE, '_') AND NVL(A.SRC_BIZ_NM, '_') = NVL(D.SRC_BIZ_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.SRC_SYS_NM, '_') = NVL(D.SRC_SYS_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_LNM, '_') = NVL(D.SRC_TBL_LNM, '_') AND NVL(A.SLT_SKP_CND_NM, '_') = NVL(D.SLT_SKP_CND_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.JN_CND_NM, '_') = NVL(D.JN_CND_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.APP_CRGP_NM, '_') = NVL(D.APP_CRGP_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.CNVS_CRGP_NM, '_') = NVL(D.CNVS_CRGP_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.REF_DESCN, '_') = NVL(D.REF_DESCN, '_') AND NVL(A.PRE_FLF_DESCN, '_') = NVL(D.PRE_FLF_DESCN, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_CHRG, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_CHRG, '_') )
mapper.select:
--테이블매핑정의서 요청서 리스트 조회 SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.OBJ_VERS, A.OBJ_DESCN , A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , A.TBL_MAP_ID, A.MAP_DF_TYPE, A.MAP_DF_ID, A.MAP_SNO, A.TBL_MAP_TYPE, A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, A.TGT_DB_ID , A.TGT_DB_PNM, A.TGT_TBL_ID, A.TGT_TBL_LNM, A.TGT_TBL_PNM, A.TGT_FLF_TYPE, A.SRC_BIZ_ID, A.SRC_BIZ_NM , A.SRC_SYS_ID, A.SRC_SYS_NM, A.SRC_DB_ID, A.SRC_DB_PNM, A.SRC_TBL_ID, A.SRC_TBL_LNM, A.SRC_TBL_PNM , A.SLT_SKP_CND_NM, A.JN_CND_NM, A.APP_CRGP_ID, A.APP_CRGP_NM, A.CNVS_CRGP_ID, A.CNVS_CRGP_NM , A.REF_DESCN, A.PRE_FLF_DESCN, A.TGT_CHRG
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAQ_TBL_MAP A LEFT JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.VRF_CD DESC, A.RQST_SNO

--테이블매핑정의서 타겟테이블 리스트 조회 SELECT A.PDM_TBL_ID AS TGT_TBL_ID, A.PDM_TBL_PNM AS TGT_TBL_PNM, A.PDM_TBL_LNM AS TGT_TBL_LNM, -- GET_DDL_TRG_DB_PNM(A.DB_SCH_ID) AS TGT_DB_PNM, B.SUBJ_ID AS TGT_SUBJ_ID, B.FULL_PATH AS TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH FROM WAM_PDM_TBL A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_WAA_SUBJ B ON A.SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID WHERE 1=1
AND (A.PDM_TBL_LNM LIKE '%' || #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR A.PDM_TBL_PNM LIKE '%' || #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAQ_TBL_MAP
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = SYSDATE , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND NVL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT * FROM WAQ_TBL_MAP WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update:
--WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_TBL_MAP A SET (TBL_MAP_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.TBL_MAP_ID AS TBL_MAP_ID , NVL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_TBL_MAP B WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = B.MAP_DF_ID
AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP B WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = B.MAP_DF_ID
AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X')
)
mapper.delete:
--WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_TBL_MAP A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_TBL_MAP B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.MAP_DF_ID = B.MAP_DF_ID
AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') )
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_TBL_MAP SELECT TBL_MAP_ID
FROM WAQ_TBL_MAP A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update:
--WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_TBL_MAP A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_TBL_MAP B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.MAP_DF_ID = B.MAP_DF_ID
AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_TBL_MAP SELECT A.TBL_MAP_ID AS TBL_MAP_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , SYSDATE AS STR_DTM
FROM WAQ_TBL_MAP A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.select:
--테이블매핑정의서 테이블 추가대상 조회... SELECT (SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_TBL_MAP WHERE RQST_NO = #{reqmst.rqstNo} ) + ROWNUM AS RQST_SNO , 'I' AS IBS_STATUS , TBL_MAP_ID , #{reqmst.rqstDcd} AS RQST_DCD , MAP_DF_ID , OBJ_VERS, OBJ_DESCN, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, MAP_DF_TYPE, MAP_SNO , TBL_MAP_TYPE, TGT_SUBJ_ID, TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, TGT_DB_ID, TGT_DB_PNM, TGT_TBL_ID , TGT_TBL_LNM, TGT_TBL_PNM, TGT_FLF_TYPE, SRC_BIZ_ID, SRC_BIZ_NM, SRC_SYS_ID, SRC_SYS_NM , SRC_DB_ID, SRC_DB_PNM, SRC_TBL_ID, SRC_TBL_LNM, SRC_TBL_PNM, SLT_SKP_CND_NM, JN_CND_NM , APP_CRGP_ID, APP_CRGP_NM, CNVS_CRGP_ID, CNVS_CRGP_NM, REF_DESCN, PRE_FLF_DESCN, TGT_CHRG FROM WAM_TBL_MAP A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.TBL_MAP_ID IN
#{item.tblMapId}
mapper.update: --매핑정의서ID UPDATE(타겟테이블 물리명 + _ + 매핑일련번호(3자리)) UPDATE WAQ_TBL_MAP A SET (A.MAP_DF_ID, A.MAP_SNO) = (SELECT B.TGT_TBL_PNM || '_' || LPAD(B.MAP_SNO,3,'0'), LPAD(B.MAP_SNO,3,'0') FROM WAQ_TBL_MAP B WHERE A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

--소스(ASIS)정보 공백처리(매핑유형:NEW,INITIAL) UPDATE WAQ_TBL_MAP A SET A.SRC_BIZ_ID = '', A.SRC_BIZ_NM = '', A.SRC_SYS_ID = '', A.SRC_SYS_NM = '', A.SRC_DB_ID = '', A.SRC_DB_PNM = '', A.SRC_TBL_ID = '', A.SRC_TBL_LNM = '', A.SRC_TBL_PNM = '' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.TBL_MAP_TYPE IN ('N', 'I')

--타겟(TOBE)테이블 주제영역정보 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_TBL_MAP A SET (A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, A.TGT_TBL_LNM) = (SELECT B.SUBJ_ID, B.PDM_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND B.FULL_PATH = NVL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH,'X') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND B.FULL_PATH = NVL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH,'X') )

--타겟(TOBE)테이블 주제영역정보 업데이트(엑셀업로드시_신규) UPDATE WAQ_TBL_MAP A SET (A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, A.TGT_TBL_LNM,A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH ) = (SELECT B.SUBJ_ID, B.PDM_TBL_LNM,B.FULL_PATH FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND ROWNUM = 1 ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND ROWNUM = 1 )

--타겟(TOBE)테이블 DB정보 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_TBL_MAP A SET A.TGT_DB_ID = (SELECT D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D WHERE D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.TGT_DB_PNM ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D WHERE D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.TGT_DB_PNM )

--타겟(TOBE)테이블ID 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_TBL_MAP A SET A.TGT_TBL_ID = (SELECT B.PDM_TBL_ID FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND B.SUBJ_ID = A.TGT_SUBJ_ID ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND B.SUBJ_ID = A.TGT_SUBJ_ID )
